resources.string: Click to log in with fingerprint
Your current password is an initial password. Pls log in after changing it!
This device didn\'t input fingerprint. Pls add fingerprint at System->Settings
This device doesn\'t support fingerprint authentification
Centralized management and control: goods, mobile account to collect money, member, statement, ect.
Companies and stores belong to the leader-member relation.In a company, there may be stores A, B, etc.For the needs of unified management in the chain mode, the functions are divided into:
The store is mainly responsible for ordering, money collection, in-store staff, member, in-store report, etc.
What is a company, a store?
Your current password is too simple. Pls change and then log in
The system has no fingerprint. Pls log in with password
Confirm login at KRY Merchant Back Office
To ensure account security, pls make sure it\'s your own operation
Upload authorized legal representative\'s qualitification pictures
The following stores can manage goods independently.
Autorized settlement legal representative\'s ID No.
Autorized settlement legal representative\'s ID No.
Barcode can only contain English letters, numbers and a “-”,but can\'t start with “-” or end with “-”
Select take-out platform you want to open up and bind it with this platform\'s account ID. Cash register will receive orders from the take-out platform.
Payment shouldn\'t be lower than receivables
In application, mobile phone will receive voice broadcasting\n outside application, system will post messages.
Dishes will be created under brand and authorized to the store. Whether to continue?
Only can create dishes under brand. Your account has no permissions
There are items under this category. Can\'t delete.
No specification for now. Pls create first
No classification for now. Pls create first
No results now. Pls change key word and try
Pls select all specifications at a time. Support multi-choice and combination
Select the specification you want to keep and improve price. Support adding barcode.
The Qty isn\'t in the range. Pls change.
Next step, fill in qualification information
Next step. Fill in settlement information
No data that can\'t be used for invoice for now
Used for sending e-invoice to you
Pls fill in taxpayer\'s registration No.
Invoice information can be changed. The original invoice will be invalidated after re-issue
Hi boss, you can issue e-invoice of orders paid at KRY. We\'ll send it to your e-mail.
Pls select at least one money collection form to issue invoice
If KRY\'s CDS has been connected, this order\'s instruction of calling No. will be sent by CDS；If CDS isn\'t connected, the instruction will be sent by cash register.
Back image of the ID card
Frontal view of the handheld ID card
There are tables in current area. Don\'t allow deletion!
Are you sure to delete this region?
5 items are tested. %1$s items can be optimized
Your order-version service has been expired. You\'ll get benefits if you renew your subscription now.
Your order-version service will expire after %s days. You\'ll get benefits if you renew your subscription now.
Your delivery-version service has been expired. You\'ll get benefits if you renew your subscription now.
Your delivery-version service will expire after %s days. You\'ll get benefits if you renew your subscription now.
Pls upload payment voucher and make sure the picture is clear. 6 pictures at most.
Incomplete upgrade. You can\'t enjoy all functions and service. Are you sure to quit?
If you buy cash register, marketing, supply chain,etc later, you can upgrade at【My-upgrade of merchant version】
Cash register bought through JD, Tmall or Keruyun
The mobile phone is a cash register. Pls experience it first.
If you bought cash register, marketing, supply chain,etc, pls ask operation and maintenance personnel for activation code to upgrade to higher version and enjoy more powerful functions！
If you bought flagship version, advanced version,etc, you can upgrade through activation code. Pls ask relevant staff for the activation code.
Don\'t allow setting up rules\n Pls add group at merchant\'s back office
There are the following groups under current brand. You can edit rules in the group. If you need to create groups or cahnge other settings, pls operate at merchant back office.
Set up top-up rules and cultivate customers\' top-up consumption habit. Moreover, set up top-up stimulus. Top up more , get more. To encourage spending and increase revenue.
Top up %1$s%2$s at a time, get %3$s%4$s
Top up %1$s%2$s at a time, no gifts
*the difference between ending time and starting time can\'t be over 31 days
How to create popularity of take-out stores and how to increase sales volume through activities?
Pls aim at the QR code on 「advance payment receipt」
Submit success. Pls wait for review outcome
You\'ve got the permission of money collection by swiping card on POS
Congratulations. Your authentification application has passed!
Pls fill in business license No. correctly
Merchant\'s short name can\'t be empty
Pls fill in corporate name correctly
Pls fill in 18-digit ID card No. correctly
Pls fill in 11-digit phone No. correctly
Pls enter legal representative\'s name and address
Pls enter legal representative\'s ID card No.
No historical record for now. Please change time and retry
Fail to load. Click me to retry
Fail to pay. Whether to continue payment
Little ON has something to say:
Pls enter merchant\'s customer service line
Bank\'s name should be all Chinese characters
1. Why you should open up payment authentification
After opening up payment authentification, the function of money collection by WeChat and Alipay can be used.
Fill in company\'s basic information, account information and submit. Review will be done in 1-3 working days.
ID number related to account name
Pls fill in 18-digit ID card No. correctly
Unionpay No. should be all numbers
Phone No. must be all numbers
Apply for opening up payment method
Submit success. Pls wait for review outcome
You\'ll get the result in 1-3 working days
Pls fill in 11-digit phone No. correctly
Pls enter settlement bank\'s CNAPS code
Bank card\'s No. should be all numbers
T1( arrive on the second working day)
Congratulations. Your authentification application has passed!
You\'ve got the following permissions to collect money
The following stores can\'t manage goods independently. You can start permissions for them
Authentification of payment by swiping card
Wrong input of selectable numbers. Pls check
Pls fill in cooking method\'s name
Pls enter maximum of optional Qty
Pls enter minimum of optional Qty
Pls enter maximum of suitable PAX
Pls enter minimum of suitable PAX
%1$s%2$s%3$d stores\' revenue of today falls over %4$s compared to yesterday. Pls pay attention.
Selected date can\'t be later than the time of that day
The difference between two periods can\'t be over 31 days
Statistics of revenue from orders w/o receipts
Statement of members\' pending orders and write-off
%1$s%2$s%3$d dishes\' sales drop over %4$s compare to yesterday\'s. Pls pay attention.
Today\'s TOP10 items of sales volume
Today\'s sales volume of %1$s%2$s%3$d dishes rise by %4$s compared to yesterday\'s. Please pay attention.
Only support viewing sales ranking or returned goods ranking. If you want to know revenue ranking, Pls go to back office.
TOP10 sales volume of items today
What is a company, a store?
Fail to get position information. Pls open position service on setup page
Whether to bind ICBC mobile payment with merchant\'s full name %1$s and legal representative name %2$s?
ICBC channels can\'t be used for payment after unbinding. Are you sure to unbind?

1. Follow public account"Smart financial service platform"
2.Choose "merchant management-merchant signing" in the menu to complete registration
3.After registration and review is done，you can check ICBC payment QR code
4.On this page，click"scan to bind"to scan ICBC QR code
Merchant doesn\'t bind ICBC\'s payment parameter
Don\'t get Alipay\'s binding information. Click to retry?
Fail to get Alipay\'s binding status. Pls click to retry.
Fail to check Alipay\'s binding status
Your Alipay account can\'t receive money after binding. Are you sure to unbind?
Single dishes number in this group can be selected when ordering
Group-buying data are gathered in statement in real time.
Increase exposure rate of Meituan and Dianping
Your On Portal has been expired. This miniprogram can\'t be used now. If you renew your subscription now , you\'ll get benefits.
Your On Portal is about to expire after %s days. If you renew your subscription now , you\'ll get benefits.
Pay with group-buying coupons, which is high -efficiency and easy.

Little ON has something to say: the first thing for merchant to do is control cost. KRY\'s supply chain service can reduce over 23.5% cost for you.KRY\'\'s supply chain service is centered on reduction of operation cost.
KRY\'\'s supply chain service is centered on reduction of operation cost. Free consultation.
Content view isn\'t found in SmartRefreshLayout.Did you forget adding the content view in xml layout file?
Wait for loading all at the bottom
No dishes that can use coupons
Wrong input of suitable numbers. Pls check
Stick table code on table and then scan them to bind
After opening, customers can order food through store\'s public account
1st step: go to mobile payment module to add mobile account to collect money——connect to online payment(WeChat, Alipay)
Fourth step: bind table code. Done
Save table\'s QR code to print by oneself \nor send official table code
Reduce workload. Customers order food on mobile phone.
Aggregated payment of WeChat and Alipay. Pay online and offline\n
Apply for table sticker here, then stick the table code on the table
After opening, customers can scan table code to order by mobile phone
Build an online On Portal. Customers can scan code on WeChat, Alipay to address offline queuing problems. Through social communication, attract customers in all directions.
Generate chromatic table code and save it to your album. It can be printed directly.
2nd step: according to store\'s needs, turn on the switch of scanning to order
After opening, customers can order takeaway through store\'s public account
Third step: apply for making table sticker
There are tables in this region. Don\'t allow deletion!
Are sure to delete this region?
Automatically accept take-out order , avoid order omission. Time-saving and high-efficiency
Reduce workload, print automatically, send to kitchen
Pls fill in seller\'s job number or operation and maintenance personnel\'s job number
(Optional. If you want to fill in 2 items, pls compelete them.
Pls fill in seller\'s name or operation and maintenance personnel\'s name
Pls complete 2 items or clear them
Tips: no permission to open up. If there is any need, pls contact your superior.
Tips: no permission to open up. If there is any need, pls contact your superior.
Bind cash register. If you have no such device, pls buy it first.
There are no dishes under this category
No change and update to data
The item is used by combo, can\'t be deleted
The item is used by combo, can\'t be disabled
Net weight can\'t be smaller than minimum Qty to sell%1$d
Pls touch frame\'s lines to select clipping region
Can only search log within 2 years
